Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.unican.meteo.esgf.petition.RequestManager

  • public class RequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class This class is responsible for sending of search requests to ESGF and process the response for make the appropiate objects
    Author:
    Karem Terry
